document.discussion_title: Poseidon Core Set - Now Live - Inside Game of War
document.topic_text:
Home / Equipment and Hero Gear / Poseidon Core Set – Now Live Poseidon Core Set – Now Live 3 hours ago Leave a comment The Poseidon Core Set and Secret Recipes are Now Live The Poseidon core set has just been released and is now live on the site. You can check out all the recipes, boosts and get a complete item list from the Poseidon Core Set page here. Or load it straight into the Core Builder so you can get customizing with different gem combos. Click here to load the Poseidon Core set into the Core Builder.
The Poseidon Core Set is a Ranged Missile Set. Alongside Zeus (Infantry) and Frostbitten (Cavalry) it completes the trio of high-power troop specific missiles. The overall power level is the highest we’ve seen, so no doubt some records are soon to be broken. For those of you that want to compare the Poseidon Set with the Zeus Set, here are the tables of their respective total boosts: Total Poseidon Core Set Boosts Total Zeus Core Set Boosts Poseidon Secret Recipes You can check out all the Poseidon Secret Recipes on the Secret Recipes Page Poseidon Cores and Pieces All the new Poseidon Cores and Pieces are here and on the Best Cores and Pieces Page here . Crimson Nian The Crimson Nian equipment, cores and pieces are now live. Check them out here Dread Angler The Dread Angler equipment, cores and pieces are also now live. Check them out here New Gems Check them out here and the updated Best Gems for Combat page here. 2016-04-25
